name: turbo-hybrid-astro-on-vercel
description: Hybrid rendering (SSR, SSG) Astro 2.0 app template using Turborepo. Deploys to Vercel.

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production dotenv yarn turbo run build --concurrency=1
scripts.preview: NODE_ENV=production dotenv yarn turbo run preview
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development dotenv yarn turbo run dev
